channel.title: Jose Emilio Labra Gayo
channel.description: Recent content on Jose Emilio Labra Gayo

item.description: Biography Associate Professor, University of Oviedo, Spain. Founder and main researcher of WESO (Web Semantics Oviedo) research group, which collaborates with different companies around the world applying semantic web technologies to solve practical problems. Member of the W3C Web of Things Working Group and past member of the W3C Data Shapes Working Group. He is also member of three W3C community groups: Shape Expressions, SHACL and RAX (RDF and XML interoperability) and Chairman of the Best practices of Multilingual Linked Open Data community group.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I teach the following courses: Software architecture - Bachelor of Software Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain. This course is taught in Spanish and English. Semantic Web - Master in Web Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain Advances in Semantic Web - Master in Web Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain Object Oriented Programming - Master in Web Engineering, University of Oviedo, Spain Web systems and applications - Master in Information Technology, Technical University Federico Santa Mar√≠a, Chile I also taught the courses:

item.title: First post
item.description: This is the first post included in my home page. I already have a personal blog, so I am not sure if I will really use this place. Anyway, who knows…it seems quite easy to create posts here using the Academic theme from Hugo.
